title: AuraCoreTech FAQ Context
instructions: Use the following question-and-answer pairs as the primary source of information to respond to user queries about AuraCoreTech's services and operations. Answer based *only* on this provided context.

Video Editing: What types of video editing services do you offer?
We offer promotional videos, corporate edits, social media reels, explainers, and motion graphics.
Which software do you use for video editing?
Our editors work with Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, DaVinci Resolve, and Final Cut Pro.
Can you add subtitles and translations to videos?
Yes, we provide accurate subtitles and multilingual translations as needed.
Do you offer animation or motion graphics?
Absolutely, we create animated intros, logo reveals, explainer videos, and kinetic typography.
Can you edit vertical videos for platforms like TikTok or Instagram Reels?
Yes, we optimize videos for all platforms including Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube Shorts.
How long does a typical video project take?
Depending on length and complexity, it usually takes 3–7 days.
Can you work with footage I provide?
Yes, we can work with raw footage from your camera, phone, or screen recordings.
Do you provide voiceover services?
Yes, we offer professional voiceovers in multiple languages and accents.
Can I request revisions?
Yes, we typically offer up to 3 rounds of revisions depending on your package.
Do you provide export in multiple formats?
Yes, we deliver in MP4, MOV, and social-ready formats like 1:1, 16:9, and 9:16.
Can you sync video edits with background music?
Absolutely, we match pacing, mood, and transitions with licensed music that fits your brand.
Company Overview: AuraCoreTech is a full-service IT and software development company providing innovative, scalable, and secure technology solutions for businesses worldwide.
We’re based in the United States, with a distributed team serving clients globally.
We work across industries such as healthcare, e-commerce, logistics, finance, and education.
Our mission is to empower businesses with intelligent digital solutions that streamline operations and drive growth.
How long has AuraCoreTech been in business?

AuraCoreTech has been delivering technology solutions for over [X] years with a strong focus on reliability, performance, and long-term value. (Note: Replace [X] with the actual number of years if known).
Custom Software Development: Do you build custom software from scratch?
Yes, we specialize in building custom software tailored to your business goals, workflows, and scalability needs.
What platforms do you develop software for?
We develop for web, mobile, and desktop platforms, ensuring cross-platform compatibility when needed.
Can you modernize my legacy system?
Absolutely. We refactor legacy systems to modern architectures with improved performance and maintainability.
Yes, every project includes full technical documentation, source code access, and deployment manuals.
How do you ensure software scalability?
We use modular architecture, containerization, and cloud-native design to ensure your software grows with your business.
Web Development: What technologies do you use for web development?
We use technologies like React, Vue.js, Laravel, Django, Node.js, and WordPress, tailored to your project needs.
Do you develop eCommerce websites?
Yes, we build secure, high-converting eCommerce platforms using WooCommerce, Shopify, Magento, and custom stacks.
Can you redesign my existing website?
Yes, we offer full UI/UX redesigns backed by performance optimization and SEO best practices.
Are your websites mobile-friendly?
Absolutely. All our websites are responsive, ensuring seamless experience across all screen sizes.
Do you offer CMS integration?
Yes, we integrate powerful content management systems to give you full control over your site’s content.
What is included in your web development service?
We offer front-end and back-end development, SEO, analytics integration, responsive design, and more.
How long does it take to build a website?
Typical turnaround is 4-8 weeks depending on complexity.
Do you provide hosting services?
We can help set up hosting or manage deployments through AWS, DigitalOcean, or other cloud platforms.
What CMS platforms do you support?
We work with WordPress, Webflow, Ghost, and also build headless CMS setups.
Can you migrate my existing website?
Yes, we offer full-site migrations including domain, content, and functionality.
Do you build custom websites or use templates?
We build from scratch based on your brand needs and UX goals, though we can also customize templates when needed.
Can I update my website content myself?
Yes, with a CMS in place, you'll be able to manage content easily.
Do you optimize websites for speed?
Absolutely, we implement caching, code splitting, lazy loading, and more to ensure fast performance.
Do you ensure cross-browser compatibility?
Yes, we test and optimize your site to work seamlessly across all major browsers.
Is SSL included in your web development?
Yes, we ensure your site has HTTPS encryption using SSL certificates.
Can you integrate third-party services like CRMs or payment gateways?
Yes, we regularly integrate tools like Stripe, HubSpot, Salesforce, and more.
App Development: Do you build both Android and iOS apps?
Yes, we use Flutter to create cross-platform mobile apps for Android and iOS.
How long does it take to build a mobile app?
Project duration typically ranges from 6 to 16 weeks depending on complexity and features.
Can you develop native apps?
Yes, we develop both native and hybrid apps based on project requirements.
What technologies do you use for mobile development?
We primarily use Flutter, React Native, Kotlin, Swift, and Firebase.
Can I preview the app during development?
Yes, we provide test builds at every major milestone for feedback and validation.
Do you assist with App Store and Google Play submission?
Absolutely. We handle the entire publishing process including store listing optimization.
How do you ensure app performance?
We follow best practices for code optimization, caching, load handling, and use analytics to monitor performance.
Is post-launch support included?
Yes, we provide 30–90 days of free post-launch support, plus optional ongoing maintenance plans.
Can I track the progress of my app development?
Yes, we use project management tools like Trello, ClickUp, or Jira to keep you informed.
Can you integrate third-party APIs in the app?
Absolutely. We regularly integrate payment gateways, social logins, CRM systems, and more.
Will I own the app and source code?
Yes, all IP rights and source code are handed over to you after final project delivery.
Graphic Design: What types of graphic design services do you offer?
We provide logo design, marketing materials, branding kits, infographics, and social media creatives.
Can I request a custom logo?
Yes, we offer custom logo design services that reflect your brand's identity and market positioning.
What file formats do you deliver?
We deliver source files in AI, PSD, SVG, PDF, PNG, and JPEG formats.
How many revisions are included?
We typically offer up to 3 revisions per project, but this can be adjusted based on your plan.
Do you create social media posts?
Yes, we create visually appealing posts for platforms like Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn.
Can you design my pitch deck or presentation slides?
Absolutely. We design business decks, proposals, and investor presentations.
What tools do your designers use?
Our designers use Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, Figma, and Canva Pro depending on project needs.
Do you offer print-ready designs?
Yes, we provide high-resolution, print-ready files suitable for any medium.
Can you match my existing branding?
Yes, we align all designs with your existing color scheme, fonts, and style guides.
Do you create brand guidelines?
Yes, we can create a full brand kit that includes logos, fonts, colors, and usage rules.
How do you ensure originality in your designs?
All our designs are created in-house, tailored uniquely for each client, and undergo plagiarism checks.
UI/UX Design: What is UI/UX design and why is it important?
UI focuses on the look and layout of the product, while UX ensures usability and functionality. Together, they create intuitive digital experiences.
What tools do you use for UI/UX design?
We primarily use Figma, Adobe XD, and InVision for designing interfaces and prototyping.
Do you provide interactive prototypes?
Yes, we provide clickable prototypes so you can test workflows and visual flows before development.
Can you redesign my existing app or website?
Absolutely. We specialize in redesigning digital platforms to improve user retention and aesthetics.
Do you conduct usability testing?
Yes, we perform usability tests to ensure our designs work for your target audience.
How do you gather user feedback?
We use surveys, user interviews, and analytics to understand user behavior and expectations.
Will I get design files after the project?
Yes, we provide all editable source files including Figma, XD, or PSD.
Can you follow my existing brand guidelines?
Yes, we adhere strictly to your brand's identity, colors, fonts, and tone.
Do you support accessibility in design?
Yes, we design with WCAG standards in mind to ensure accessibility for all users.
How long does a typical UI/UX design project take?
Depending on complexity, it may take 1 to 4 weeks.
Can you help define the user journey?
Absolutely, we map out user journeys and information architecture to support seamless user interactions.
Digital Marketing: What digital marketing services do you offer?
We provide SEO, PPC, social media management, email marketing, content strategy, and analytics.
How does SEO help my business?
SEO improves your visibility in search engines, driving organic traffic and qualified leads.
Do you manage Google Ads or Facebook Ads?
Yes, we create and manage campaigns across Google, Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, and more.
Can you help me with local SEO?
Absolutely. We optimize your website for local search and manage Google Business Profiles.
Do you write content too?
Yes, our team crafts SEO-optimized blog posts, landing pages, and ad copy.
How do you measure campaign performance?
We use tools like Google Analytics, Search Console, and Data Studio to track KPIs and generate detailed reports.
Do you offer social media marketing?
Yes, we manage posting schedules, community engagement, and ad campaigns for all major social platforms.
What platforms do you support for PPC?
We support Google Ads, Bing Ads, Meta Ads (Facebook/Instagram), LinkedIn, and Twitter/X.
Can you guarantee ranking on Google?
No ethical agency can guarantee rankings, but we follow proven white-hat SEO methods to consistently improve performance.
Do you handle email marketing?
Yes, we design campaigns, set up automation flows, and segment lists using platforms like Mailchimp, Klaviyo, and HubSpot.
How often will I receive marketing reports?
We provide detailed reports weekly or monthly, based on your preference, with performance insights and strategy updates.
Client Onboarding Process: What is your client onboarding process like?
We follow a structured 5-step onboarding: discovery → scoping → agreement → kickoff → project dashboard setup.
What happens during the discovery call?
We explore your business needs, challenges, goals, and timelines. It helps us understand your vision before proposing a solution.
Will I get a detailed proposal before signing?
Yes, we deliver a customized proposal with scope, timelines, pricing, milestones, and tech stack recommendations.
How do you finalize the project scope?
We hold collaborative sessions and deliver an SRS (Software Requirements Specification) document to lock the scope.
Do you provide a project timeline during onboarding?
Absolutely. We create a Gantt-style timeline with estimated delivery dates for each milestone.
What contracts or documents do I need to sign?
You’ll typically sign a Master Service Agreement (MSA), NDA, and a Project Agreement with Exhibits (A-Z).
Will I get access to a project dashboard?
Yes, we use tools like ClickUp, Notion, or Jira where you can track real-time progress, files, and communications.
Who will be my point of contact after onboarding?
You’ll be assigned a dedicated project manager who will be your primary communication bridge with the development team.
How do you handle communication post-onboarding?
We establish structured communication via email, Slack, and weekly/bi-weekly review calls.
Can I request changes after onboarding is complete?
Yes. We handle all change requests through a formal Change Request Order process, defined in Exhibit G.
How long does onboarding typically take?
It typically takes 3–7 business days depending on project complexity and response time from the client.
What’s expected from me during onboarding?
You’ll need to provide business insights, project materials (if any), timeline expectations, and decision-making availability.
Technology Expertise: What programming languages does your team specialize in?
We work with Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, PHP, Dart, Kotlin, and Swift — depending on the use case and platform.
What front-end frameworks do you use?
We use React, Next.js, Vue.js, and Svelte — optimized for responsive, fast-loading web apps.
What back-end technologies do you prefer?
Our primary back-end stacks include Node.js, Django (Python), Laravel (PHP), and Firebase (serverless architecture).
Do you build mobile apps with native or cross-platform tech?
Both. We use Flutter and React Native for cross-platform development, and Kotlin/Swift for native apps when required.
What database technologies do you use?
We work with PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Firebase Realtime DB, and Redis — based on project architecture.
Do you provide cloud-native architecture?
Yes, we architect apps for AWS, GCP, Azure, and DigitalOcean — with CI/CD pipelines, containers, and infrastructure as code.
Can you work with microservices or monolithic architecture?
Yes. We design systems using microservices for scalable projects, or monoliths for smaller, simpler apps.
Do you implement containerization or DevOps pipelines?
Absolutely. We use Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI/CD, and Terraform for robust DevOps pipelines.
What CMS systems do you support?
We support WordPress, Webflow, Strapi, Ghost, and build headless CMS systems where performance matters most.
Do you offer AI/ML integration in software?
Yes, we integrate ML models using Python (TensorFlow, Scikit-learn), OpenAI APIs, and chatbot solutions for automation.
What analytics or data visualization tools do you implement?
We integrate tools like Google Analytics, Amplitude, Mixpanel, and dashboards using D3.js or Chart.js.
Do you follow coding standards and best practices?
Absolutely. We enforce linting, code reviews, test coverage, and follow SOLID, DRY, and KISS principles.
Can you work with existing codebases or migrate legacy systems?
Yes, we audit existing codebases and modernize apps from PHP, .NET, or older JavaScript stacks into modern frameworks.

General Security Standards: How does AuraCoreTech ensure software security?
We follow OWASP Top 10 guidelines, implement secure coding practices, and conduct static/dynamic code analysis throughout development.
What encryption protocols do you use?
We use AES-256 for data-at-rest and TLS 1.2+ for data-in-transit. Sensitive data is hashed using SHA-256 where applicable.
Do you conduct vulnerability assessments or penetration testing?
Yes, we offer periodic security audits, VAPT (Vulnerability Assessment & Penetration Testing), and collaborate with third-party specialists for critical applications.
How do you handle secure authentication?
We implement OAuth 2.0, multi-factor authentication (MFA), JWT-based sessions, and optional biometric login for mobile apps.
Do you use secure APIs and role-based access control (RBAC)?
Yes. All endpoints are access-controlled via RBAC/ABAC, and APIs follow HTTPS, rate-limiting, and token-based authorization.
Data Protection & Compliance: Yes, we design systems to be GDPR-compliant — including user consent, data access requests, and the right to be forgotten.
How do you comply with CCPA (California Consumer Privacy Act)?
We provide users transparency, opt-out options, and secure mechanisms for data collection, sharing, and deletion.
What about HIPAA compliance for healthcare apps?
We implement end-to-end encryption, audit trails, role-based access, and secure data storage to meet HIPAA standards.
Do you offer SOC 2 compliance support?
Yes, for enterprise clients, we help prepare and build software aligned with SOC 2 Trust Principles: Security, Availability, Confidentiality, and Privacy.
What data retention policies do you follow?
Data is retained as per project agreements or client-specific regulations, and securely purged post-retention using cryptographic wipe methods.
Infrastructure & DevOps Security: How do you secure cloud infrastructure?
We configure least-privilege access, use IAM roles, secure keys in vaults (e.g., AWS KMS), and deploy using IaC tools like Terraform.
Are backups encrypted and regularly tested?
Yes. Backups are encrypted at rest, automated, and periodically validated via restore tests.
Yes. Our pipelines enforce signed commits, pre-deploy checks, security scanning, and secrets management.
What is your disaster recovery policy?
We define RPO/RTO based on business needs, with cross-region backups and fallback environments in place for mission-critical apps.
How do you handle breach response?
We have an incident response protocol: detection → notification → containment → root cause → resolution, with logs for postmortem analysis.

General Post-Launch Support: What kind of support do you offer after project completion?
We provide bug fixing, performance monitoring, uptime assurance, feature tweaks, and security patches based on your selected support plan.
Is post-deployment support included in the contract?
Yes. Every project includes a free support window of 30 to 90 days, depending on project scope. Extended support plans are optional.
What happens if bugs or issues are found after launch?
We resolve post-launch issues based on severity levels (critical, major, minor) with dedicated SLAs. Critical bugs are addressed within 24 hours.
Can I request small updates or enhancements post-launch?
Yes. You can request UI changes, content updates, minor feature adjustments, etc., either hourly or via prepaid support credits.
How do I report a problem or request support?
Support tickets can be raised via email, your client portal, or Slack (if integrated). A ticket ID is generated, and status updates are shared automatically.
Maintenance & Monitoring: Do you offer ongoing maintenance services?
Yes. We offer monthly or quarterly maintenance packages that include performance tuning, cache management, library updates, and system health audits.
What’s included in your monitoring solutions?
We monitor uptime, app errors, server CPU/memory, DB response time, and real-user load using tools like UptimeRobot, New Relic, or Sentry.
Can you maintain third-party apps not built by AuraCoreTech?
Yes. We first audit the app, evaluate codebase health, and then offer a tailored maintenance & support contract.
How do you handle updates for third-party libraries or dependencies?
We track version updates and critical patches weekly, test them in a staging environment, and deploy during maintenance windows.
Will I be notified before any backend update or downtime?
Yes, we provide at least 48 hours’ notice for scheduled maintenance. Emergency patches are communicated in real-time via your preferred channel.
SLA & Response Time Commitments: We offer Basic, Premium, and Enterprise SLAs with guaranteed response/resolution times: Basic: 1–2 business days; Premium: 8–12 hours; Enterprise: 1–4 hours for critical issues.
How fast do you respond to support tickets?
Ticket response time depends on your SLA. However, most queries are acknowledged within 4–6 business hours.
24/7 support is available under our Enterprise SLA or custom retainer agreements.
Knowledge Transfer & Handover: What do I receive during final handover?
You receive source code, admin credentials, documentation, cloud access (if applicable), and deployment instructions.
Can I train my in-house team post-handover?
Yes. We offer onboarding workshops, recorded walkthroughs, and live Q&A support sessions as part of premium packages.
